splash.initiative: iNaturalist is a joint initiative of the California Academy of Sciences and the National Geographic Society

species_nearby.location_error: In order to show you nearby species, we need to use your location.
species_nearby.internet_error: We need the internet to generate nearby species. Tap to try again.

get_started.tip_1: Check out species commonly spotted near you in the “Nearby Species” section above. Search by location or specific taxa!
get_started.tip_2: Take a photo of a plant, animal, or anything living using our camera, and our AI model will identify it for you!
get_started.tip_3: Take a challenge sponsored by OurPlanet and WWF and find species with the worldwide Seek community!

challenges_card.join: Join the global observation challenge and follow along with OurPlanet on Netflix!

inat_signup.permission: You need to be 13 or have parent's permission to make an account
inat_signup.release_photos: Yes, release my photos so scientists can use my data
inat_signup.data_usage: How Seek + iNat use my data

inat_login.log_in_with_inat: Log in with your iNaturalist account.
inat_login.no_worries: No worries, we'll email you a link to reset it.

onboarding.onboarding_1: Take a photo of anything living and Seek’s AI will identify it!
onboarding.onboarding_2: Earn badges for seeing different species
onboarding.onboarding_3: Participate in global challenges with OurPlanet and WWF

challenges.species_likely: Species you're most likely to see near

results.computer_vision_error: Can't load computer vision suggestions. Try again later.
